p: It is noted that SARS-CoV-2 envelope spike (S) protein has a decisive role for determining host tropism and transmission capacity [ 46] and T cell epitopes-based peptide derived from S proteins that map to SARS-CoV-2 proteins [ 47] and subunit vaccines based on S protein are also considered for preventing SARS-CoV-2 infection [ 47, 58, 59].
